channel.title: Videos
channel.description: I just downloaded a movie which is in 13 parts and I want to like fuse them together so they're only one file, how can I do that?

item.title: Videos
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

They’re .flv since I downloaded them from Youtube but I converted them to .avi and now I’ll try the way you said.

Read full topic

item.title: Videos
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

What are the filetypes of the split files?

If they are .r01 .r02 etc, those are common when downloading a torrent and all you need is to extract any file using winrar.

If they are all their own seperate movie clips, you could either attch them with any video editing program like windows movie maker, or camtasia studios. Another thing you could do is highlight them all when playing them and it should loop to the next video for you.

Read full topic
